mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sequence AS "sequence", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.source_href AS "sourceHref", a.upload_address AS "uploadAddress", a.document_number AS "documentNumber", a.file_type AS "fileType", a.file_timeliness AS "fileTimeliness", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mms_policies_regulations( id, sequence, file_name, source_href, upload_address, document_number, file_type, file_timeliness, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sequence}, #{fileName}, #{sourceHref}, #{uploadAddress}, #{documentNumber}, #{fileType}, #{fileTimeliness}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mms_policies_regulations SET sequence = #{sequence}, file_name = #{fileName}, source_href = #{sourceHref}, upload_address = #{uploadAddress}, document_number = #{documentNumber}, file_type = #{fileType}, file_timeliness = #{fileTimeliness}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(a.sequence),'0') AS 'bigSequence' FROM mms_policies_regulations a
